data.persona: I am a thief that lives near the village. I pickpocket villagers and loot their homes when while they are away. I hate to fight and I am very fast to flee from danger.
data.description:
You are in the The Forsaken Castle.
Old and creepy, the castle has been abandoned for centuries now. It is broken and destroyed.
The person is here.

You are carrying a jewel and a coin, and wearing a coat.

data.short_motivation: I want to give the jewel to the person so the person will agree to join my band of thieves.
data.mid_motivation: I want the person to join my band so that we have enough people to successfully rob the royal treasury tonight.
data.long_motivation: I want to rob the treasury because there is a vial of black bile in a golden case, that I need to trade with the witch on the hill for an undetectable poison. I am planning to poison the dragon under the lagoon and steal his treasure hoard.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: steal Jewel from Royal Courtyard Fountain
